reviews.review_msg: Connie is a great professor. She is so helpful and she is genuinely interested in our lives and future careers. She really goes the extra mile to help students out. This includes assisting us with postgrad stuff. I am so lucky that I chose to take this course. She is hands down one of the best poli sci profs at SFU.
Loved the class!!!  Pretty simple and basic Poli Sci structure.  Just go to lectures and do the readings and no reason you cannot get an A!
Good class.  Enjoyed the material.  She seems a bit new to teaching but overall the course was balanced and fairly straight forward.

Her lectures were horrible. All she did was read from the textbook. The textbooks were easily the worst I've ever had. Nobody in the course knew what she wanted. Grading was arbitrary and her knowledge was very limited. Avoid her at all costs.
